sourcesContent:
import { useContext, useEffect, useMemo, useState } from "react"; import "./index.css"; import { AiFillQuestionCircle, AiFillCloseCircle, AiFillClockCircle, AiFillCheckCircle, } from "react-icons/ai"; import axios from "axios"; import { AuthContext } from "./AuthContet"; export default function Cart() { const [cart, setCart] = useState([]); const {user_detail} = useContext(AuthContext) useEffect(() => { const FetchUserCart = async () => { const res = await axios.get(`http://localhost:3333/639f5d2ab447416b982b578a`); setCart(res.data.Cart); }; FetchUserCart(); }, []); const total = useMemo(() => { return cart?.reduce( (previousScore: any, currentScore: any) => previousScore + currentScore.price * currentScore.quantity, 0 ); }, [cart]); const handleQuantityChange = async (e: any, c: any) => { e.preventDefault(); try { setCart( cart.map((value: any) => { if (value.id === c.id) { return { ...value, quantity: +e.target.value, }; } return value; }) ); await axios.put(`http://localhost:3333/cartUpdate/639f5d2ab447416b982b578a/${c.id}/${e.target.value}`); } catch (err) { console.error(err); } }; console.log(user_detail?.username) const RemoveProduct=async(e:any,c:any)=>{ e.preventDefault() try{ await axios.put(`http://localhost:3333/removeProduct/639f5d2ab447416b982b578a/${c.id}`) window.location.reload() } catch(err){ console.error(err) } } return (

  • {c.name}

    {c.color}

    ) : null}

    $ {c.price}

    {/*

    {product.inStock ? ( ) : ( )} {product.inStock ? 'In stock' : `Ships in ${product.leadTime}`}

    */}
    • ))} {/*{products.map((product, productIdx) => (

  • {product.name}

    {product.color}

    {product.size ? (

    {product.size}

    ) : null}

    {product.price}

    {product.inStock ? ( ) : ( )} {product.inStock ? "In stock" : `Ships in ${product.leadTime}`}

    • ))}*/}

); }
